cover-01.title: 30ms of Cloudflare Wizardry with Code and Coffee: TLDR;
cover-01.author: Bob Fornal & Lwin Maung
cover-01.bio1:
Senior Solutions Developer II, Leading EDJE, Inc.
Passionate about learning, testing, mentoring, speaking, and personal growth.
cover-01.bio2:
Microsoft MVP | Managing Director, Accolade Solutions
Full stack polyglot development consultant with passion for creating IoT, mobile, web, and cloud products with a flair for user experience and user interface design.

why-are-we-here.title: We are here ...
why-are-we-here.text1:
Lwin & Bob
  • Found common excitement.
Super Script: Built a tool for managing ...
  • Redirects
  • Split-tests
  • Dynamic Content
This script handles millions of Worker Script hits per day.

the-demo.title: Live Demo
the-demo.text2:
We will be examining...
  • Registering a User (uses API, KV, DB)
  • Empty Page (structure)
  • User Page (uses DB)
  • Refresh (uses API & Selection for Split Test)
  • Cookie (attached, uses DB)
  • Redirect (page to user's page, uses KV)
  • Split-Test (to selected pages, uses KV)
